blocks.heading: Implement  **Dynamics 365** to better service you and your customers
blocks.description:
Your customer data isn't structured.

Your teams lack visibility.

Everything feels very manual.

Your Dynamics 365 investment isnâ€™t delivering.

SSWâ€™s Dynamics experts tailor the platform to fit your unique business, not force your business to fit Dynamics, allowing your sales, service, and marketing teams to work together.

blocks.heading: Why Dynamics 365 configuration is critical to your success
blocks.description:
Often businesses jump into Dynamics 365 expecting instant clarity and ROI, only to find the default configuration doesnâ€™t reflect their  unique business processes. When screens, fields, and workflows donâ€™t align with how your teams operate, adoption drops quickly and the power of the platform is wasted.

Each organisation is as unique as a fingerprint! We understand this and tailor your environment to match how you work. This ensures your sales processes and customer journeys reflect how you work.

The end result is a system that feels natural to your people. This drives better customer insights, consistent processes, and a CRM your teams actually trust.

features.heading: Workflow automation
features.description: Automate repetitive workflows so your teams can focus on meaningful work. By automating tasks, approvals, and handovers, Dynamics reduces manual effort, removes bottlenecks and ensures every step of your process happens consistently.

features.heading: Capture information with a user friendly UI
features.description: Capture all essential customer information through a clean, intuitive interface. Our experts can help customise your solution. Users can enter the right data quickly, ensuring teams record accurate and complete details.

cards.heading: A Single Source of Truth
cards.description: Dynamics centralises all customer interactions, communications, sales activity, cases, and history in one place. This gives your team complete visibility and reduces duplication, confusion, and lost information.

cards.heading: Increased Team Accountability
cards.description: With assigned tasks, SLAs, workflows, and activity tracking, every team member knows their responsibilities, which improves collaboration and removes ambiguity.

cards.heading: Seamless Microsoft Integration
cards.description: Native integration with Outlook, Teams, SharePoint, Power BI, and Microsoft Fabric ensures a unified digital workplace and reduces double handling.

accordionItems.label: What's the difference between Dynamics configuration and customization?
accordionItems.content:
Different modules and components can be turned on/off within the Dynamics platform, that's configuration.

At SSW, we go further with customization: Our .NET developers can build bespoke solutions, integrations, and workflows that allows your Dynamics CRM to become the backbone of your business.

For example, perhaps you want new leads within Dynamics to be automatically routed to the right salesperson, but your internal routing rules depend on multiple factors such as industry, deal size, geo-location, lead score, product interest etc. Complex routing of this nature can be best achieved using custom plugins. Something our team excel at!

accordionItems.label: How long does a typical Dynamics implementation take?
accordionItems.content: It varies significantly based on scope. Simple implementations with out-of-the-box features (team sites, document libraries, basic workflows) can be deployed in weeks. Complex Enterprise solutions requiring custom development, legacy system integration, data migration and other factors can result in a project taking several months. During your initial meeting, we'll discuss your requirements and provide a realistic timeline. Our approach is transparent; we'll tell you exactly what's involved and how long each phase will take.

accordionItems.label: What happens in the free initial meeting?
accordionItems.content:
Our sales manager and a Dynamics consultant will meet with you to understand your business requirements and current challenges. We'll discuss whats working and you want replicated in the solution vs what pain points need to be addressed and resolved.

Then we'll assess whether Dynamics is the right fit and provide honest recommendations. Many common business needs (Sales Pipeline, Customer Account Information, Approval Workflows) can be handled with ease using Dynamics out-of-the-box features. For more complex scenarios, we'll explain how custom development can solve your specific  Dynamics challenges.

accordionItems.label: Should we choose Dynamics in the cloud or an on-premises solution?
accordionItems.content: Microsoft has clearly aligned their Dynamics platform to be a cloud based service. Whilst Microsoft does still support on-premise versions of the solution, its not their priority. All new features being rolled out to the Dynamics platform are cloud first, often not being available for the legacy on-premise version.
